00032 bool SimpleBinaryFile::CreateNewFile(const std::string &fileName)
00033 {
00034     outFile.open(fileName.c_str(), std::ios::out | std::ios::binary);
00035     return (outFile ? true : false);
00036 }
00037 
00038 void SimpleBinaryFile::WriteHeader(int rows, int cols, const std::string &rowHeaderLabel, int rowHeaderLabelMaxLength, const std::vector<std::string> &colIds, const std::vector<std::string> &colNames)
00039 {
00040     rowHeaderLength = rowHeaderLabelMaxLength;
00041     WriteInt32_N(outFile, rows);
00042     WriteInt32_N(outFile, cols);
00043     WriteString_N(outFile, rowHeaderLabel);
00044     WriteInt32_N(outFile, rowHeaderLength);
00045     for (int icol=0; icol<cols; icol++)
00046         WriteString_N(outFile, colIds[icol]);
00047     for (int icol=0; icol<cols; icol++)
00048         WriteString_N(outFile, colNames[icol]);
00049 }
00050 
00051 bool SimpleBinaryFile::Close()
00052 {
00053     if (outFile.is_open())
00054     {
00055         outFile.close();
00056         return !outFile.fail();
00057     }
00058     if (inFile.is_open())
00059     {
00060         inFile.close();
00061         return !inFile.fail();
00062     }
00063     return false;
00064 }
00065 
00066 void SimpleBinaryFile::WriteRow(const std::string &rowLabel, const std::vector<float> &values)
00067 {
00068     WriteRowLabel(rowLabel);
00069     for (std::vector<float>::const_iterator it=values.begin(); it!=values.end(); ++it)
00070         WriteFloat_N(outFile, *it);
00071 }
00072 
00073 void SimpleBinaryFile::WriteRowLabel(const std::string &rowLabel)
00074 {
00075     WriteFixedString(outFile, rowLabel, rowHeaderLength);
00076 }
00077 
00078 void SimpleBinaryFile::WriteData(float data)
00079 {
00080     WriteFloat_N(outFile, data);
00081 }
00082 
00083 void SimpleBinaryFile::UpdateRowCount(const std::string &fileName, int rows)
00084 {
00085     std::ofstream fileStr; 
00086     fileStr.open(fileName.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::out | std::ios::binary);
00087     WriteInt32_N(fileStr, rows);
00088     fileStr.close();
00089 }
00090 
00091 bool SimpleBinaryFile::OpenFile(const std::string &fileName, int &rows, int &cols, std::string &rowHeaderLabel, std::vector<std::string> &colNames)
00092 {
00093     inFile.open(fileName.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
00094     if (!outFile)
00095         return false;
00096     ReadInt32_N(inFile, rows);
00097     ReadInt32_N(inFile, cols);
00098     ReadString_N(inFile, rowHeaderLabel);
00099     ReadInt32_N(inFile, rowHeaderLength);
00100     colNames.resize(cols);
00101     for (int icol=0; icol<cols; icol++)
00102         ReadString_N(inFile, colNames[icol]);
00103     dataStartPos = inFile.tellg();
00104     rowSize = rowHeaderLength + (sizeof(float) * cols);
00105     return true;
00106 }
00107 
00108 void SimpleBinaryFile::ReadRow(int row, std::string &rowLabel, std::vector<float> &data)
00109 {
00110     inFile.seekg(dataStartPos + row*rowSize);
00111     ReadFixedString(inFile, rowLabel, rowHeaderLength);
00112     for (int i=0; i<(int)data.size(); i++)
00113         ReadFloat_N(inFile, data[i]);
00114 }
